name: Orbital Defender (raincoven, temapavloff)
description:
You playing for the commander of asteroid orbital battle station. The harvesters are gathering the really valuable resources from the space crystals and transfer it so Silo Depo. The number of crystals transfered to depo is showing the result of your work. The nasty slimes from evil dimension (we not sure about it) are protecting the crystals and eating the harvesters.

As an commander of battle station you should to protect the harvesters and kill the slimes. If slime eat the harvester you steel have the time to kill it and save the harvester (it well beep by right light).

Use WASD or arrow keys to fly cross the asteroid and press space button or left mouse button to shoot from the laser gun. You also able to use the scroll weal to zoom the asteroid.

Good luck Commander and have fun!

PS: The personal log in the left bottom corner of the screen is really helpful. Do not ignore it.!

This is the Ludum Dare 38 Jam entry sou you free to visit game page on ldjam and put your marks. We really appreciate it!
